card.name: [OP] Edward.Newgate [OP02-001]
card.text: [End of Your Turn] Add 1 card from the top of your Life cards to your hand.

card.name: [OP] Monkey.D.Garp [OP02-002]
card.text: [Your Turn] When this Leader or any of your Characters is given a DON!! card, give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 7 or less −1 cost during this turn.

card.name: [OP] Edward.Newgate [OP02-004]
card.text: [On Play] Up to 1 of your Leader gains +2000 power until the start of your next turn. Then, you cannot add Life cards to your hand using your own effects during this turn. [DON!! x2] [When Attacking] K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with 3000 power or less.

card.name: [OP] Curly.Dadan [OP02-005]
card.text: [On Play] Look at up to 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 red Character with a cost of 1 and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: [OP] Jozu [OP02-008]
card.text: [DON!! x1] If you have 2 or less Life cards and your Leader's type includes "Whitebeard Pirates", this Character gains [Rush]. (This card can attack on the turn in which it is played.)

card.name: [OP] Squard [OP02-009]
card.text: [On Play] If your Leader's type includes "Whitebeard Pirates", give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters −4000 power during this turn and add 1 card from the top of your Life cards to your hand.

card.text: [Activate: Main] You may rest this Character: Play up to 1 red Character other than [Dogura] with a cost of 1 from your hand.

card.name: [OP] Vista [OP02-011]
card.text: [On Play] K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with 3000 power or less.

card.name: [OP] Blenheim [OP02-012]
card.text: [Blocker] (After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.)

card.name: [OP] Portgas.D.Ace [OP02-013]
card.text: [On Play] Give up to 2 of your opponent's Characters −3000 power during this turn. Then, if your Leader's type includes "Whitebeard Pirates", this Character gains [Rush] during this turn. (This card can attack on the turn in which it is played.)

card.name: [OP] Whitey Bay [OP02-014]
card.text: [DON!! x1] This Character can also attack your opponent's active Characters.

card.name: [OP] Makino [OP02-015]
card.text: [Activate: Main] You may rest this Character: Up to 1 of your red Characters with a cost of 1 gains +3000 power during this turn.

card.name: [OP] Magura [OP02-016]
card.text: [On Play] Up to 1 of your red Characters with a cost of 1 gains +3000 power during this turn.

card.text: [DON!! x2] [When Attacking] K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with 2000 power or less.

card.name: [OP] Marco [OP02-018]
card.text: [Blocker] (After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.) [On K.O.] You may trash 1 card with a type including "Whitebeard Pirates" from your hand: If you have 2 or less Life cards, play this Character card from your trash rested.

card.name: [OP] Rakuyo [OP02-019]
card.text: [DON!! x1] [Your Turn] All of your Characters with a type including "Whitebeard Pirates" gain +1000 power.

card.name: [OP] Seaquake [OP02-021]
card.text: [Main] If your Leader's type includes "Whitebeard Pirates", K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with 3000 power or less. [Trigger] Give up to 1 of your opponent's Leader or Character cards −3000 power during this turn.

card.name: [OP] Whitebeard Pirates [OP02-022]
card.text: [Main] Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 Character card with a type including "Whitebeard Pirates" and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order. [Trigger] Activate this card's [Main] effect.

card.name: [OP] You May Be a Fool...but I Still Love You [OP02-023]
card.text: [Main] If you have 3 or less Life cards, you cannot add Life cards to your hand using your own effects during this turn. [Trigger] Up to 1 of your Leader gains +1000 power during this turn.

card.name: [OP] Moby Dick [OP02-024]
card.text: [Your Turn] If you have 1 or less Life cards, your [Edward.Newgate] and all your Characters with a type including "Whitebeard Pirates" gain +2000 power. [Trigger] Play this card.

card.name: [OP] Kin'emon [OP02-025]
card.text: [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] If you have 1 or less Characters, the next time you play a {Land of Wano} type Character card with a cost of 3 or more from your hand during this turn, the cost will be reduced by 1.

card.name: [OP] Sanji [OP02-026]
card.text: [Once Per Turn] When you play a Character with no base effect from your hand, if you have 3 or less Characters, set up to 2 of your DON!! cards as active.

card.name: [OP] Inuarashi [OP02-027]
card.text: If all of your DON!! cards are rested, this Character cannot be removed from the field by your opponent's effects.

card.text: [End of Your Turn] Set up to 1 of your DON!! cards as active.
